# init(personIdentityProof:signatureData:)

**Initializer**

Creates and intializes a signed identity object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(personIdentityProof: SWPerson.IdentityProof, signatureData data: Data)
```

## Parameters

- **personIdentityProof**: The [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYouCore/SWPerson/IdentityProof] the system uses to create the signed identity.
- **data**: The data for the signature.
title: init(personIdentityProof:signatureData:)
